openRoles.name: Developer
openRoles.description: Our developers are the backbone of our Core team. Each will be assigned to a small AGILE team and work closely with a researcher to complete their project.

openRoles.name: Design Lead
openRoles.description: Sandbox is looking for a design lead to work closely with the executive board to further develop our brand identity.

openRoles.name: DevOps Lead
openRoles.description: Sandbox is looking for a DevOps lead to work closely with our technical director to make sure environments are properly set up for developers and to abstract away infrastructure to use for multiple projects.
